title: MATTY DARK CAP crease-free VG for trade
author: Luke

posts.post_title: MATTY DARK CAP crease-free VG for trade
posts.post_content:
Hey guys,

I'm looking to add one of the bigger cards to my 150-350 subset.  Figured I would try dangling this one as trade bait.

Looking for these cards in GD or better.  Some of these are worth more than the Matty.  I have cash and a ton of other stuff to trade if you have one of those cards that you could part with:

A lot (but not all) of my other trade stuff can be found here:
[url]http://stores.ebay.com/lukesvintagecards[/url]

Bender portrait Old Mill (maybe EPDG)
Crawford throwing Old Mill
Elberfeld NY Hindu
Elberfeld Wash
Johnson port Sov150 or EPDG (+cash obviously)
Keeler with bat EPDG or Old Mill (maybe Sov150)
Lajoie portrait Sov150 or Old Mill (or Hindu +cash from me)
Matty portrait Sov150 or Old Mill (+ cash from me)
Matty white cap Sov150 or Old Mill (+cash from me)
McGraw portrait no cap Hindu or Old Mill
Pelty Hindu
Tinker portrait Hindu, EPDG, or Old Mill
Tinker hands on knees Hindu or Old Mill
Young bare hand Sov150 or Old Mill

I'd also be interested in a stack of crease-free commons that I need with EPDG or Sov150 backs (or maybe a Hindu or 2 depending on which players)
